p: In the published studies, the decoupling factor has been used to examine the relationship between CO2 emissions and real income. This kind of analysis provides information about the continuous economic growth and sustainable environment dilemma for the countries. In addition to the real income, there is one more main factor that contributes to CO2 emissions, namely, population. Therefore, in this study, the existence of decoupling between population and CO2 emissions will be also investigated.
